member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Platform.RddGroup
member.summary: Resource group enumeration.
member.remarks: Values: 0 - Undefined 1 - MSSQL 2 - Soap Web Service 3 - Soap WCF Service 4 - Plain Http 5 - Windows Azure Table 6 - Windows Azure Queue 7 - Windows Azure Blob Container 8 - Any HTTP call (including calls from Azure Storage SDK).

member.summary: Soap WCF Service.

member.summary: Http calls except Azure SDK calls.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Platform.RddGroup.AzureTable
member.summary: Windows Azure Table.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Platform.RddGroup.AzureQueue
member.summary: Windows Azure Queue.

member.summary: Windows Azure Blob Container.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.random
member.summary: Generator singleton.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.index
member.summary: Index of the last used random number within pre-generated array.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.segmentCount
member.summary: Count of segments of random numbers.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.segmentSize
member.summary: Number of random numbers per segment.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.bitsToStoreRandomIndexWithinSegment
member.summary: Number of bits used to store index of the random number within segment.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.segmentIndexMask
member.summary: Bit mask to get segment index bits.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.randomIndexWithinSegmentMask
member.summary: Bit mask to get index of the random number within segment.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.randomArrayIndexMask
member.summary: Bit mask to get index of the random number in the pre-generated array.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.randomGemerators
member.summary: Array of random number batch generators (one per each segment).

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.randomNumbers
member.summary: Array of pre-generated random numbers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes generator with a set of random numbers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.Initialize(System.Func{System.UInt64,Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.IRandomNumberBatchGenerator},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes generator with a set of random numbers.
member.param: Factory used to create random number batch generators.
Number of significant bits in segment index, i.e. value of 3 means 8 segments of random numbers - 0..7.
Number of significant bits in random number index within segment, i.e. value of 10 means 1024 random numbers per segment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.Next
member.summary: Weakly thread safe next (random) operation id generator where 'weakly' indicates that it is unlikely we'll get into collision state.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.RequestTracking.WeakConcurrentRandom.RegenerateSegment(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates random number batch for segment which just exhausted according to value of the new index.
member.param: Index in random number array of the random number we're about to return.
